> Jhiaxus' boasts are stopped as he realized that although he was effective=
, the 
> Sweeps had changes strategy and were boxing him in. Suddenly some =
of the 
> rear Sweeps were destroyed by Myrmidon. Jhiaxus banks out of the =
trap with him.
> 
> Jhiaxus: I hate to say this but I wish the Maximals wou=
ld fight back more...
=A0
Myrmidon grunted as he fell in with Jhiaxus, =93T=
hey are pitiful fools but how can even they sit there and do nothing as the=
 ground upon which they stand is being blown out from beneath them!?=94
=A0=

> As Sweeps moved into position to box in Jhiaxus again. Jhiaxus pulls up =
and 
> performs a 360 degree dive, ending up behind the approaching Sweeps.=
 He 
> fires all rockets and lasers.
=A0
Myrmidon followed Jhiaxus, his man=
euver not quite as elegant as the G2 Decepticon co-commander, but he manage=
d to come around, lining up on the Sweeps!
=A0
From their twin bursts of fi=
repower many sweeps vanish in bright clusters of explosions that peal throu=
gh the skies! A rather respectable gap is opened up for the duo as the move=
d through the skies. 
=A0
> Blckfortress defences burned as Minions started=
 to hit them, the repair drones 
> started to work but they started to fall=
 as well. hydras cotinued opening fire
> against the minions
=A0
The sweeps=
 are generally taking a beating, but it can be noted that they are learning=
 as they go, becoming smarter and more agile as the weaponry they are faced=
 with begins to grow. Many of them are gunned down by the laser fire of Myr=
midon, Jhiaxus and then the Black Fortress, and yet they continue to keep c=
oming, an unrelenting force of power rushing the meager defenders of the Pr=
edicon base. 
=A0
With an eerie strangeness, as if guided by some unseen in=
telligence, they fire their weapons in retaliation completely in sync, disi=
ntegrator beams ripping into the jets (Myrmidon/Jhiaxus) above and at the (=
Black) fortress below. Then swiftly they swoop high into the air again, tem=
porarily giving the base below a gap, a small space to breathe. It is obvio=
us that any moment now they will again begin to press their attack as their=
 numbers quickly begin to regroup and organize.
=A0
> OOC: if drones arent =
allowed just ignore that part
=A0
OOC: I can=92t speak for anyone else, but=
 I have no problem with drones.
Preston
(Da'minion)
